data.title: Kaimuki - Honolulu, Hawaii Newsletter June 2024
data.meta_description: Web site about the Kaimuki, Hawaii community featuring events, calendar, news, jobs, resources, businesses, photos and information.
data.text:
Aloha ,

LOTS of new Kaimuki updates for you! There are too many to post in our newsletter so make sure you check out the news/calendar listings links at the bottom of this newsletter.

Get to know our featured merchants (profiles) and all the upcoming events, special offers, news and coupons available for the community! Browse through KaimukiHawaii.com to learn more about the community and its thriving businesses!

Click on image on right to view/buy Mark N. Brown Art>>>

Also consider liking us on Facebook and following us on Twitter @kaimukihawaii.

Aloha,

Ernest Abrams

808-739-9797

Serving the Kaimuki Community for over 15 years!

https://www.kaimukihawaii.com

14,000 - 20,000 Unique visitors a month!

Help KaimukiHawaii.com grow...support our sponsors

OFFICIAL SPONSORSHIP - if you would like to become an "official sponsor" let me know an I will Email you a proposal. One of the best ways to generate new business/revenue and brand your company with the Kaimuki community...year round.

Profiles featured

this month.

Pipeline Bakeshop &amp Creamery

Himalayan Kitchen - Kaimuki Restaurant

Hawaii State Senator District 10 - Les Ihara, Jr.

Palolo Valley District Park

Epiphany Episcopal Church - Kaimuki

Malu Pet Bliss

FEATURES AND HIGHLIGHTS

(Back to the top) - Our top picks and opportunities for the month. BREW’d Craft Pub - COMING JULY EVENTS

Kaimuki's first gastropub serving the greatest selection of craft beer, creative beer friendly food! More...

NEW - Hawaii Theatre - COMING EVENTS

Proclaimed as the "Pride of the Pacific," the beautiful Hawaii Theatre, built by the Consolidated Amusement Company, opened its doors September 6, 1922 in downtown Honolulu. More...

Culinary Institute Of The Pacific & Culinary Institute Of America Team Up To Transform Hospitality Training In Hawai‘i

The Culinary Institute of the Pacific (CIP) at Kapi‘olani Community College unveiled details of their groundbreaking collaboration with the renowned Culinary Institute of America (CIA), the world’s premier culinary college.a More...

Kaimuki Library Coming Events (JULY 2024 - see notes)

Welcome to the Kaimuki Public Library! Designed by local architect Shoso Kagawa, our library opened on June 17, 1965. Our busy regional library opens 6 days a week and is one of only 3 public libraries open on Sundays. In 2015, our library celebrated its 50th Anniversary. More...

Foodland Super Market Cooking Videos - - Mahalo for 75 Years! Special Offers!

Great Foodland Cooking Videos with Chef Keoni.

Home Cooking with Foodland: Beef Luau and Lomi Tomato

Home Cooking with Foodland: Blackened Ahi Caesar Salad

Home Cooking with Foodland: Grilled Flank Steak, Creamy Smashed Cucumbers and Sangria

Bitter Melon and Pork with Black Beans and Chinese Chicken Salad

More... Kapi‘olani Community College Office of Continuing Education and Training - Coming Summer Culinary Courses

Kapiʻolani Community College, formerly Kapiʻolani Technical School, is a public, co-educational commuter college in Honolulu, Hawaiʻi situated on the slopes of Diamond Head in Waikīkī. It is one of ten branches of the University of Hawaiʻi system anchored by the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. More...

Capitol Modern - The Hawai‘i State Art Museum JULY 2024 Events

Capitol Modern is eager for the public to experience this next chapter in their evolution as the people’s museum, and the opportunity to reach diverse audiences in all Hawai‘i communities. More...

American Red Cross - Hawaii - Prepare for Hurricane / Disaster Resources & Tips

Get tips and resources to prepare for disaster. Hurricanes, Tsunamis, Volcanoes, Floods, Fires, Terrorism, Power Outage, Pandemic Influenza. Make sure you are ready! More...

Diamond Head Theatre Presents - Disney's Frozen (July 26 to August 18, 2024, 2024 - See notes for times)

“For the First Time in Forever,” DHT is thrilled to present the full-length version of Disney’s FROZEN! This timeless tale of true love and acceptance between sisters will bring Elsa, Anna, Olaf, Sven, and the magical land of Arendelle to life, onstage. More...

City Announces Independence Day Holiday Schedule

City and County of Honolulu offices will be closed on Thursday, July 4, 2024 to observe the Independence Day holiday. More...

Japanese Cultural Center Of Hawaii (JCCH) -COMING SPECIAL EVENTS/NEWS -

Our Motto -- Honoring our heritage. Embracing our diversity. Sharing our future. Throughout the last year, the Japanese Cultural Center of Hawaiʻi held unique programs and produced new digital content to continue fulfilling its mission of educating present and future generations in the evolving Japanese American experience in Hawai‘i. Here's a look back of the year. More...

Hawaii State Public Library System's (HSPLS) - 2024 Summer Reading Challenge

This summer’s theme is E Heluhelu Kākou: Moʻolelo; Hawaii’s public libraries will be celebrating the rich and varied stories that shape our communities.

Register and learn more about the Summer Reading Challenge. More...

AARP Hawaii Caregiving Coming Events JULY 2024 (JULY 2024 - See Notes)

AARP in Honolulu is here to help you take on today - and every day. From sharing practical resources like job, health, and financial workshops, to holding fun activities and events, AARP is providing opportunities to connect and help build an even stronger Honolulu. We hope you'll join us! More...

Honolulu Zoo "Wildest Show In Town" Summer Concert Series 2024 Master Page (June 12 to July 24, 2024 - 7/10/2024)

Hold onto your safari hats and prepare for a summer of untamed fun! The Honolulu Zoo Society’s annual Wildest Show concert series will unleash the year’s ultimate party, promising a menagerie of music that’ll have guests roaring for more! The after-hours concert series features a dynamic lineup of local talent, including Nā Hōkū Hanohano award-winning artists and beloved Hawai’i performers. More...

FEATURED PROFILE - Hawaii Theatre Center

Preserving Yesterday, Performing Today, Preparing for Tomorrow. More...

Whole Foods Market - Offers Sales, Coupons, Discounts - GET - COUPONS / SPECIALS

The Health Starts Here program assists you to make healthier choices. More...

JUNE 2024 ESTATE & TRUST TIP - How Do You Fund Real Property Into A Trust

As the trust document is insufficient by itself without completing the funding process, it is important to remember to have your attorney complete the funding process of your assets into the trust. More...

2024 Asia Pacific Dance Festival - Save the date:August 5-10, 2024!

We are back this summer with another fabulous Asia Pacific Dance Festival. More...

City Mill Home Improvement Centers - Kaimuki Store View Profile, History, Video, Jobs And More...

When you think of home improvement projects, repairs or maintenance, think of City Mill, where Hawaii's Kama’aina shop. City Mill has everything in lumber, building materials, decor, furniture, garden, housewares, hardware, electrical, tools, plumbing, flooring, paint, patio, organization, storage and much, much more. Plus, lots of friendly, knowledgeable folks ready to help with your home improvement needs. We are a superhardware retail chain serving the Oahu Community with 8 stores on the island of Oahu. More...

Sunset on the Beach - Waikiki, Honolulu, Hawaii - Summer 2024 - June 22, 2024, July 13, 2024, August 10, 2024, Sept, 2024, Oct 12, 2024

This popular summer series at Queen's Surf Beach (across from the Honolulu Zoo) will start at 4:30 p.m., and feature live, Hawaiian entertainment beginning at 5 p.m. There will be a variety of exciting games for all ages, and a diverse mix of restaurants and food vendors selling their delicious creations. The evening will culminate with the showing of a hit movie on the 30-foot-wide big screen as the sun goes down around 7 p.m. All events are free and open to the public. More...

The Magical Mystery Show at Hilton Waikiki Beach Hotel - $20 Off Coupons, Discounts, Promo Codes, Free Offers, Sales - Oahu, Waikiki Honolulu, Hawaii

Best Magic Show in Oahu, Waikiki, Honolulu, Hawaii - Travel back in time to a "London Salon" for a truly magical show brought to you by our world-class magicians. Like the parlour magicians of the old era, they will mystify you with illusions at The Magical Mystery Show! Join us at the Hilton Waikiki Beach Hotel to see the miracles of magic for yourself. GET $20 OFF OR FREE MAGIC KIT ($25 VALUE) More...

Family Fun At The Waikiki Aquarium - JULY 2024 Events And Programs (JULY 2024 - see notes)

Founded in 1904, the Waikiki Aquarium is the second oldest public aquarium in the United States. A part of the University of Hawai`i at Manoa since 1919, it is located next to a living reef on the Waikiki shoreline. More...

50TH STATE FAIR at Aloha Stadium - 2024

The tradition continues as the 50th State Fair returns to Aloha Stadium to kick off Memorial Day Weekend! More...

FEATURED PROFILE - BREW’d Craft Pub

Kaimuki's first gastropub serving the greatest selection of craft beer, creative beer friendly food! More...

Blood Drives in Kaimuki Areaa (JUNE 2024 - seen notes for times)

A great way to give back to the community and possibly save a life! More...

Waikiki Beach Activities at Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort Surf Lessons, SUP Yoga, Boat Cruises - Great Prices and Offers

BOOK NOW! Book your activity, surf lessons, sup yoga, boat cruise at great prices in Waikiki, Honolulu, Hawaii. More...

Movie Museum JULY 2024 Movie Schedule

Great movies at the Movie Museum. Click here to view Movie Museum profile. More...

"Hawaii is King" Blessed With Three Of The Best Beaches In America - Duke Kahanamoku Beach, Waikiki, Oahu, Hawaii Ranked #1

Very good news that has been seen all over the national media. The big story is, "Hawaii is king" blessed with three of the Best beaches in America. Duke Kahanamoku Beach, Waikiki, Oahu, Hawaii ranked #1. More...

Honolulu Zoo Calendar JULY 2024 Events And Programs (JULY 2024)

View all the great events and programs the Honolulu Zoo has to offer. More...

City To Expand Online Tee Time Availability For Ala Wai, Ted Makalena Golf Courses

Online tee time reservations will soon be available for all tee times at the Ala Wai and Ted Makalena municipal golf courses via the automated tee time reservation system. More...

Honolulu Named Safest City to Visit in the World

Representatives of the Hawai‘i Tourism Authority, Hawai‘i Lodging & Tourism Association, City and County of Honolulu, and an array of public safety professionals and visitor industry partners made a special announcement during a press conference at the Hawai‘i Convention Center today commemorating Honolulu for being recognized by Berkshire Hathaway Travel Protection as the "Safest City to Travel to in the World" in 2024. More...

Third Fridays Kaimuki Master Page - JULY 2024 (7/19/2024)

Art, food, music and fun. Third Fridays Kaimuki is a monthly event where Kaimuki merchants and businesses come together to celebrate all the great things that the community has to offer! More...

JUNE 2024 FIRE SAFETY TIP - Cook With Caution To Prevent Home Fires

Most kitchen fires are caused by unattended cooking. To help prevent home fires that start in the kitchen, here are a few tips you might find helpful. More...

Summer Programs Honolulu, Hawaii for Children and Adults - Kaimuki - Oahu 2024

Check out some of the summer programs available for both children and adults. More...

Hawai‘i Public Radio (HPR) - HPR Welcomes Two New Hosts To 'Bridging the Gap'

The eclectic music program airs weeknights 10 p.m. to midnight on HPR-1. Hawai‘i Public Radio welcomes two new hosts to its contemporary music program, Bridging the Gap. More...

Alzheimer's Association - Hawaii Aloha Chapter - Educational Opportunities (JULY 2024 - See Notes)

The Alzheimer's Association -- Hawaii serves the residents of Hawaii, with staff located on Oahu, Maui, Kauai and the Big Island. We help all those facing Alzheimer's disease and other dementias by providing local support groups and educational resources, while advancing crucial research and public policy initiatives. More...

Hawaii State Library - New, Faster Checkout At Your Local Library

New technology will make checking out materials faster and more convenient at Hawaii's public libraries. "We're now able to check out stacks of books, CDs, DVDs and other materials at one time rather than individually," said Stacey A. Aldrich, State Librarian. "This will make getting in and out of the library much faster," she added. More...

Chaminade - Register Today: Nonprofit Organization Seminar 2024 - August 8, 2024

Nonprofit organizations face challenges not only with the difficult economic climate during this unprecedented time but also with changes in tax rules and regulations. This seminar will provide useful information on current issues and updated requirements that affect nonprofit organizations. More...

50TH STATE FAIR at Aloha Stadium - 2024 (Until July 7, 2024)

The tradition continues as the 50th State Fair returns to Aloha Stadium to kick off Memorial Day Weekend! More...

Down to Earth Organic & Natural Super Savers Sale and Coupon Sheet for the Kaimuki Community - GET COUPONS / SPECIALS

Get Down to Earth Organic & Natural Sales sheet/Coupon for the Kaimuki community ALL VEGETARIAN Organic & Natural More...

The Honolulu Zoo Welcomes New Male Sumatran Tiger

The City and County of Honolulu is pleased to announce the arrival of Satu, an eight-year-old male Sumatran tiger who was transported to the Honolulu Zoo. Satu was born in Miami, Florida and arrives in Honolulu having previously lived at the Cameron Park Zoo in Waco, Texas. More...

JDM Sky Auto Repair New Hours of Operation - 7am - 5pm 6 days a week

We have extended hours and have appointments available as early as 7AM and as late as 5PM 6 days a week to make it easier for you to come in. More...

Star of the Sea Schools Elementary & Middle School

Mary, Star of the Sea School was established in 1946 by the Diocese of Honolulu. Situated in Waialae-Kahala, on a spacious 14 acre site, the school consists of an elementary and middle school with grades Kindergarten to 8. It now shares its campus with Mary, Star of the Sea Parish and Mary, Star of the Sea Early Learning Center. More...

Midas Hawaii - We Take Care Of Everything

TIRES. BRAKES. OIL. EVERYTHING. Click on link to get online specials and coupons. More...

City And County Of Honolulu Shares Oahu Flood Risk Survey Results

The City and County of Honolulu conducted the Oʻahu Flood Risk Survey between February and March 2024 to better understand residents' awareness of flood risk, knowledge of flood insurance, and experience with flooding events. More...

Himalayan Kitchen Restaurant Coupon, Discount, Specials - CELEBRATING 15+ YEARS

Free appetizer of Garlic Naan bread with order of regularly priced entree. Serving innovative cuisine from different regions of Nepal & India, with genuine, friendly hospitality served great vigor and enthusiasm. More...

Third Triennial Surf Calendar Posted For North Shore Surf Events

Following the recent adoption of revised Shore Water Event Rules, along with extensive outreach and coordination efforts with event organizers and the public, the Honolulu Department of Parks and Recreation (DPR) has posted the triennial calendar for North Surf Events scheduled from January 2025 through May 2027. More...

Capitol Modern is eager for the public to experience this next chapter in their evolution as the people’s museum, and the opportunity to reach diverse audiences in all Hawai‘i communities. More...

FEATURED PROFILE - Consolidated Kahala Theatre

Consolidated Theatres Kahala, located at Kahala Mall, has been a mainstay in the Honolulu community since it's opening in 1986, and is thrilled to be reopening after a full renovation with luxury recliner seating and an expanded, locally-inspired food and beverage menu. Consolidated Theatres at the Kahala Mall will enhance guests' movie-going experiences with a focus on memorable food, comfort, and safety. More...

Now open 7 Days a Week, 6am - 8pm for your emergency dental care, teeth cleanings and general dental services. Please know that we have further heightened our already extremely rigid sterilization procedures to keep our patients safe. Our number one priority preventing the spread of COVID-19 in our community.
